entry.title: New release for Storyteller: Release mobile-v1.9.2
New release for Storyteller: Release mobile-v1.10.0
entry.content:
1.10.0 (2025-03-10)

added (1 change)

  • More mobile ui updates (merge request)
    • Add support for importing custom font files
    • Fix album art resizing in the player screen so that it's truly responsive on all screen sizes
    • Adjust the displayed playback times to account for the playback rate (e.g., divide times by 2 when playback is set to 2x)
    • Add support for automatic rewinds. When the audio is paused, it will rewind a short period of time. If the pause is longer than 5 minutes, it will rewind by longer. Both times are configurable, and the feature can be disabled entirely.
    • Fixes the "reset to defaults" button for typography settings
    • Uses a more useful estimation of page size that maps more closely to paperback book page length
    • Adds some padding to the bottom of the reader settings to that everything is visible and touchable
    • Increases the tap target for select fields considerably
